title: [CRASH] redis 6.2.3

comments_data.body:
That crash log looks odd. As if several processes are crashing at the same time and they all print into the same log file. 
Also, what's Signal 7? Please specify which OS you're using.
And maybe have a look at the system logs at that time of the crash to see if you can find something.
